lines.text: It'll work, man - we can do it.
We rip off gangster player we'll have half of China after us.
We'll be in and out of there before they even know what hit 'em. They won't know it's us. We can do it.
It's not too dangerous. I know exactly - I know when the drop takes place. We can do it. It's a piece of cake.
He's right - why should be buy it when we can just take it?
